channel.title: Code for crafting. plz, need help with it
channel.description:
how can i make crafting work on pimpscape source?
like making a code were it says:
if chizel is used with uncut dimond, delete uncut dimond, add cut dimond, add 1000 xp.
somthing like that in code form i just want to know how to do that i can put in the id's for the items to delete and stuff.
thanks ;D
